type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.HasGradleProject
type.description: An element that is associated with a Gradle project. Via the Gradle project you can access (list, run, etc.) Gradle tasks.

method.name: getGradleProject
method.description: The associated Gradle project. Via the gradle project you can access (list, run, etc.) Gradle tasks.

property.name: gradleProject
property.description: The associated Gradle project. Via the gradle project you can access (list, run, etc.) Gradle tasks.
